name: eps_revisions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: This API endpoint returns analystsâ€™ revisions of a company's future quarterly and annual earnings per share (EPS) over the last week and month.

Availability: Mega plan
Data weighting: 20 API credits per symbol

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company.

exchange.description: Filter by exchange name or mic code. Defaults to None.

country.description: Filter by country name or alpha code. Defaults to None.
